page.title: 04Clatworthy Reservoir Info.
page.content: { Description of Reservoir The reservoir was built between 1957 and 1960. The shore on one side is slate and small stones. The banks around the reservoir are covered in grass with a few flowers. The water is very deep. On the other side of the dam are storage pools. {Purpose of Reservoir } The reservoir is used for fishing and sailing. {Land Use Around The Reservoir The land is uncultivated. Some of the fields have cows and sheep in them. There are a few coniferous trees and a few cottages nearby. {Public Access To The Reservoir There is a road which leads to the car park where we left the minibus. The car park is situated so that people can look at the reservoir from their cars. Around the car-park are benches
